des:
No messing around - just the worst possible copywriting advice, straight from the robot's mouth. 

Are you a seasoned copywriter looking unlearn your craft? Perhaps you're new to writing, and just want to make sure you never improve? With Bad Copywriting Advice, you'll always know how to communicate in thoroughly unsatisfying style.
